meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Victor Quillen Julia Novakovic Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7146.

td.p: Victor Quillen, a career counselor from Kingsport, Tennessee
Julia Novakovic, an archivist originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 11-day cash winnings total $339,411)

tr.td: WINTER IS COMING
A SONG OF "ICE" & "FIRE"
YOU KNOW NOTHING
THE NORTH REMEMBERS
ALWAYS PAY YOUR DEBTS
